template.name: MovingObs
template.parameter: const id_t ID, const ST_CSTATE &initCS, const ST_RECTANGLE &shape, const ST_PAIR trajectory[MAXTP]

location.name: Move
location.label: vars.x' == vars.velocity*cos(vars.orientation) && vars.y' == vars.velocity*sin(vars.orientation) && vars.velocity' == vars.acceleration && vars.orientation' == vars.yawRate && vars.yawRate' == 0 && vars.acceleration' == 0

template.name: Controller
template.parameter: const id_t ID, const ST_CSTATE &initCS, const ST_RECTANGLE &shape, const ST_RULES &rules

location.name: Turn_Const
location.label: One cannot turn and acc or brake simutaneously.

template.name: Dynamics

location.name: Move
location.label: varsEgo.x' == varsEgo.velocity*cos(varsEgo.orientation) && varsEgo.y' == varsEgo.velocity*sin(varsEgo.orientation) && varsEgo.velocity' == varsEgo.acceleration && varsEgo.orientation' == varsEgo.yawRate && varsEgo.yawRate' == 0 && varsEgo.acceleration' == 0 && D' == getDisP2P(dStateEgo.position, planning.goal) - dStateEgo.detection.reach * 100 + dStateEgo.detection.collide * 50 + dStateEgo.detection.outside * 50

query.formula: simulate [<=MAXTIME] { varsEgo.acceleration, i2d(dStateEgo.acceleration), varsEgo.velocity, i2d(dStateEgo.velocity) } under safe
simulate [<=MAXTIME] { varsEgo.yawRate, i2d(dStateEgo.orientation), varsEgo.orientation } under safe
simulate [<=MAXTIME] { varsEgo.x, i2d(dStateEgo.position.x), varsEgo.y, i2d(dStateEgo.position.y) } under safe

strategy reachSafe = minE(D) [<=MAXTIME] {egoController.location}->{dStateEgo.position.x, dStateEgo.position.y, dStateEgo.velocity, dStateEgo.orientation, dStateEgo.acceleration, dStateEgo.yawRate}: <> time>=MAXTIME under safe

strategy reach = minE(D) [<=MAXTIME] {egoController.location, dStateEgo.position.x, dStateEgo.position.y, dStateEgo.velocity, dStateEgo.orientation, dStateEgo.acceleration, dStateEgo.yawRate}->{}: <> time>=MAXTIME
simulate [<=MAXTIME] { varsEgo.x, i2d(dStateEgo.position.x), varsEgo.y, i2d(dStateEgo.position.y) } under reach
